bug.author: dustsigns
bug.summary: Copy-paste error in parameter description (documentation) of setTrackbarMin
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.3 Operating System / Platform => - Compiler => -
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
The parameter of is documented as (<denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/3.3.0/d7/dfc/group__highgui.html#gabe26ffe8d2b60cc678895595a581b7aa>http://docs.opencv.org/3.3.0/d7/dfc/group__highgui.html#gabe26ffe8d2b60cc678895595a581b7aa</denchmark-link> )
New maximum position.
I suppose that this is a copy-paste error from the documentation of (<denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/3.3.0/d7/dfc/group__highgui.html#ga7e5437ccba37f1154b65210902fc4480>http://docs.opencv.org/3.3.0/d7/dfc/group__highgui.html#ga7e5437ccba37f1154b65210902fc4480</denchmark-link> ). <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Suggestion: Change the description of minval to
New minimum position.
or something similar.

comments.comment: hi can i take up this issue as my first pr?
There is already PR for this - check link above your comment : <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/9429>#9429</denchmark-link> .
oops sorry i will look for some other issue to start contributing.
